overview: Gracie and Bailey are work out buddies. After the gym, Bailey complains that her husband Mark won't fuck her like he used to. With Gracie thrown in the mix, Mark can't keep his hands off them! There is a new pizza delivery girl in town, and Tommy and his wife decide to order a pie as an excuse to check her out. When she catches them having sex, she doesn't hesitate to join. Rayveness is pissed at her husband Tommy because he spends too much time at work. She invites her coworker Ashley over to take some sexy pics to send him, which makes him come home immediately to a sexy surprise. Rachel and her husband go by Nickey's place to check out the house that's for sale. When they enter her bedroom and spot some sex toys on her bed their evening takes a sexy turn.
title: Threesome Adventures 2
